name: Bitcoin
description: A decentralized digital currency without a central bank or single administrator.

name: Ethereum
description: A decentralized open-source blockchain featuring smart contract functionality.

name: Binance Coin
description: A cryptocurrency created by Binance exchange.

name: XRP
description: A digital currency designed for cross-border payments and remittances.

name: Cardano
description: A proof-of-stake blockchain platform that aims to provide a more sustainable and secure infrastructure for decentralized applications.

name: Chainlink
description: A decentralized oracle network that provides data to smart contracts on the blockchain.

name: Stellar
description: A decentralized payment network that aims to enable fast and low-cost cross-border transactions.

name: Polkadot
description: A sharded blockchain that enables interoperability between different blockchains.

name: Litecoin
description: A peer-to-peer cryptocurrency that enables fast and low-cost transactions.

name: Bitcoin Cash
description: A cryptocurrency that forked from Bitcoin in 2017 with a larger block size limit to enable faster and cheaper transactions.
